org.mini2Dx.core.graphics

Class ShapeTextureCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.core.graphics.ShapeTextureCache

  • public class ShapeTextureCache
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements a cache of textures for shapes

    • Method Detail

      • getFilledRectangleTexture

        public com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture getFilledRectangleTexture(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color color)
        Returns a filled rectangular texture for the provided Color
        Parameters:
        color - The Color to fetch a texture of
        Returns:
        A new Texture if this is first time it has been requested, otherwise it will return a cached instance of the Texture for the given Color

      • getRectangleTexture

        public com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture getRectangleTexture(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color color,
                                                    int width,
                                                    int height,
                                                    int lineHeight)
        Returns a rectangular texture for the provided Color
        Parameters:
        color - The Color to fetch a texture of
        width - The width of the rectangle
        height - The height of the rectangle
        lineHeight - The line height of the rectangle
        Returns:
        A new Texture if this is first time it has been requested, otherwise it will return a cached instance of the Texture for the given Color

                                                 int radius,
                                                 int lineHeight)
        Returns a circle texture for the provided Color
        Parameters:
        color - The Color to fetch a texture of
        radius - The radius of the circle
        lineHeight - The line height of the circle
        Returns:
        A new Texture if this is first time it has been requested, otherwise it will return a cached instance of the Texture for the given Color
